summary:
Senior leader with 16 years of experience in organization transformation at country, regional and global level gained in industry and consulting. Passionate about leading complex projects and programs with financial and organizational impact, delivered for example by structuring performance processes, organization (re)design, reorganizations, change management, business control/business partnering and building high performance teams. Track record in the logistics sector (Netherlands, Denmark, UK) and consultancy across industries.

Skills: stakeholder management, problem solving, focus & drive, organizing & planning.

profile_positions.description:
